title: Friendly monospaced
content:
Hi,

I'm looking for a friendly monospaced font like the example.  
Any suggestions?

Thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [14\_large.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018111745/http:/typophile.com/files/14_large.png) | 132.9 KB |
author: Perron 9

comments.content: Part of the friendly, cute flavor of that comes from its boldness, but I daresay you won't find a true monospace font in that style, at least one that includes an M, W, m, or w...
you could ask [Erik](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018111745/http:/erikkluijver.com/projects/de-raad-van-kinderen/) as he designed the example you've shared.
